channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on Masood Sadat

item.title: Collecting Tweets with R
item.description: In this post I am going to download tweets using twitteR package. To being, you have to have a twitter account. If you do not have, create a twitter account on twitter.com. Create a twitter application on apps.twitter.com. There, you have to insert a number of information, see the following screen shot.
